GULF OF GUINEA.
PIRACY.
DNC 01.
M/V ATTACKED IN 02-48.4N 006-40.9E AT 110230Z APR.
VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR
OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
